From R Views - Fake Data with R
Simulation is central to computational stats & #RStats.
But while many sim tasks are trivial in R, creating adequate synthetic data is challenging. Explore a few of the many R packages that are useful for simulating data.
https://t.co/8OS6RIAqKg https://t.co/2WW6yGrS6f

A hallmark of functional programming languages is the lack of assignment statements. Once a variable is defined its value cannot be changed. I was wondering how to make #RStats act that way and came up with this solution. Fun to see this actually working. https://t.co/mpD2vFV7Wy
